EasyQuest.Name: Catch Ship Darkshore 1
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Usefuls.ContinentId == (int) ContinentId.Azeroth && !ObjectManager.Me.InTransport || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(296) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(474) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(472) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(304) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(303) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(634) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(555) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(9435) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(505) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(510) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(564) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(681) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(514) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(563) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(322) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(203) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(204) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(194) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(186) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(191) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(627);

EasyQuest.Name: Catch Ship to Ratchet 1

EasyQuest.Name: Hearthstone Astranaar
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") == "Astranaar" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1029);

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 1
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Astranaar" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1029) || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Astranaar");

EasyQuest.Name: Hearthstone Wetlands
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") == "Deepwater Tavern" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(474);

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 2
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Deepwater Tavern" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(474) || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Deepwater") || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Menethil");
